project.description:
TODO Keywords: + Generics
This project includes some very simple examples involving the creation of custom generic types.
Point: Creates a parameterized Point class that represents a point in space. The parameter is not bound, and therefore accepts any type of argument.
PointXY: Creates a parameterized Point class that represents a point in space. The parameter is not bound, and therefore accepts any type of argument.
TwoTuple: Creates a parameterized type to represent a Pair.
ThreeTuple: Creates a parameterized type representing a 3-tuple using inheritance on TwoTuple class.
The classes includes simple runners and JUnits.
